what: Load Profiles for Electricity from BDEW
title: Load Profiles for Electricity from BDEW
text: load profile describes consumption profile energy consumer time. package standardlastprofile provides load profile data electricity German Association Energy Water Industries (BDEW Bundesverband der Energie- und Wasserwirtschaft e.V.) tidy format.  practice, standard load profiles used energy suppliers create annual consumption forecast customers (customer groups) modern meter. , customers whose electricity consumption continuously measured. load profile simplification necessarily correspond consumption profile individual customer, valid approximation larger group similar customers.

title: Load Profiles for Electricity from BDEW
text: can install development version standardlastprofile GitHub :

title: Load Profiles for Electricity from BDEW
text: standardlastprofile package contains one dataset called load_profiles used plot . dataset contains 9.504 observations 5 variables. Given ‘day’ ‘period’ data load_profiles given ‘profile’ represents ‘typical day’, e.g. Sunday winter versus workday summer. 11 load profiles 3 customer groups: idea “H0” etc. stands , alone. H0: households (German: “Haushalte”) G0 G6: commerce (“Gewerbe”) L0 L2: agriculture (“Landwirtschaft”) Call get_load_profile_info() information examples.
code: library(standardlastprofile) data(package = "standardlastprofile") head(load_profiles) #>   profile period      day timestamp watt #> 1      H0 winter saturday     00:00 70.8 #> 2      H0 winter saturday     00:15 68.2 #> 3      H0 winter saturday     00:30 65.9 #> 4      H0 winter saturday     00:45 63.3 #> 5      H0 winter saturday     01:00 59.5 #> 6      H0 winter saturday     01:15 55.0

title: Load Profiles for Electricity from BDEW
text: can use function get_load_profile() generate time series given profile. algorithm sets December 24 31 Saturday, public holiday Sunday – Sunday. Note: now package supports public holidays Germany, retrieved nager.Date API.

title: Load Profiles for Electricity from BDEW
text: Data published website BDEW: https://www.bdew.de/energie/standardlastprofile-strom/

title: Load Profiles for Electricity from BDEW
text: Please note project released Contributor Code Conduct. participating project agree abide terms.

title: Generate a load profile — get_load_profile
text: get_load_profile() returns load profiles form quarter-hourly values (Watt) standardised annual consumption 1,000 kWh.

title: Generate a load profile — get_load_profile
text: profile Name load profile, see 'Details'. start_date starting date ISO 8601 date format, required end_date end date ISO 8601 date format, required

title: Generate a load profile — get_load_profile
text: data.frame three columns: start_time, class POSIXlt end_time, class POSIXlt watt, numeric

title: Generate a load profile — get_load_profile
text: Given start end date, day first mapped combination workday, Saturday, Sunday period, .e. summer, winter, transition - result -called "type day". values period, day, profile can taken load_profile data set. Supported profiles : H0: households (German: "Haushalte") G0 G6: commerce ("Gewerbe") L0 L2: agriculture ("Landwirtschaft") Call get_load_profile_info() information profiles. day mapped one three values : saturday: Saturdays; Dec 24th Dec 31th considered Saturday , Sunday sunday: Sundays public holidays workday: Monday Friday Periods defined BDEW: summer: May 15 September 14 winter: November 1 March 20 transition: March 21 May 14, September 15 October 31 See: https://www.bdew.de/energie/standardlastprofile-strom/ methodology used determine profiles.

what: Load Profile Data for Electricity from BDEW — load_profiles
title: Load Profile Data for Electricity from BDEW — load_profiles
text: load profile shows variation electrical load versus time. Data provided German Association Energy andvWater Industries (BDEW Bundesverband der Energie- und Wasserwirtschaft e.V.).

title: Load Profile Data for Electricity from BDEW — load_profiles
Load Profile Data for Electricity from BDEW — load_profiles
text: data frame 9,504 rows 5 columns: profile character, one 11 load profiles, see 'Details' period factor, one 'summer', 'winter', 'transition' day factor, one 'saturday', 'sunday', 'workday' timestamp character, format %H:%M watt numeric, electricity load

title: Load Profile Data for Electricity from BDEW — load_profiles
text: https://www.bdew.de/energie/standardlastprofile-strom/ https://www.bdew.de/media/documents/1999_Repraesentative-VDEW-Lastprofile.pdf

title: Load Profile Data for Electricity from BDEW — load_profiles
text: load profiles available form quarter-hourly values Watt standardised annual consumption 1,000 kWh. differentiated workday, Saturday Sunday three annual periods winter, transitional period summer. Hence profile 96 values per weekday period. See 'Details' information. Included eleven representative load profiles covering three different customer groups: households: H0 commercial: G0, G1, G2, G3, G4, G5, G6 agriculture: L0, L1, L2 Call get_load_profile_info() get description profile. Periods defined BDEW: summer: May 15 September 14 winter: November 1 March 20 transition: March 21 May 14, September 15 October 31 addition, distinction made three different type days: workday: Monday Friday saturday: Saturdays; Dec 24th Dec 31th considered Saturday , Sunday sunday'`: Sundays nationwide holidays Germany

what: standardlastprofile: Load Profiles for Electricity from BDEW — standardlastprofile-package
title: standardlastprofile: Load Profiles for Electricity from BDEW — standardlastprofile-package
text: load profile describes consumption profile electricity consumer certain period time. electricity customers without modern meter devices, energy utility uses standardised load profiles (SLP). SLPs replace non-existent load profile end consumers calculated, sufficiently accurate forecast electricity consumption 15-minutes basis. packages provides data German Association Energy Water Industries (BDEW Bundesverband der Energie- und Wasserwirtschaft e.V.) tidy format. eleven profiles, 96 quarter-hourly values included three different days week - workday, Saturday, Sunday - three different seasons - summer, winter, transition -, .e. total 3x3x96 observations per profile.

title: standardlastprofile: Load Profiles for Electricity from BDEW — standardlastprofile-package
text: Maintainer: Markus Döring m4rkus.doering@gmail.com
